verses.verse: <S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who are destroying and <S%H6>scattering<s%> the <S%H6327>sheep<s%> of My <S%H6629>pasture!<s%>" <S%H4830>declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> who are <S%H7462>tending<s%> My <S%H5971>people:<s%> "You have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> My <S%H6629>flock<s%> and <S%H5080>driven<s%> them <S%H5080>away,<s%> and have not <S%H6485>attended<s%> to them; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H6485>attend<s%> to you for the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>deeds,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Then I <S%H589>Myself<s%> shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of My <S%H6629>flock<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them and shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> to their <S%H5116>pasture;<s%> and they will be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply.<s%>

"I shall also <S%H6965>raise<s%> up <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them and they will <S%H7462>tend<s%> them; and they will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>terrified,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will any be <S%H6485>missing,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> [the] <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "When I shall <S%H6965>raise<s%> up for <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6780>Branch;<s%> And He will <S%H4427>reign<s%> as <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H7919>act<s%> <S%H7919>wisely<s%> And <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"In His <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely;<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> is His <S%H8034>name<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> He will be <S%H7121>called,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [the] <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "when they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>'

but, 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up and <S%H935>led<s%> back the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from [the] <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I had <S%H5080>driven<s%> them.' Then they will <S%H3427>live<s%> on their own <S%H127>soil.<s%> "

As for the <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me, <S%H3605>All<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H7363>tremble;<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> Even like a <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H5674>overcome<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> And <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

For the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H5003>adulterers;<s%> For the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H56>mourns<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H423>curse.<s%> The <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> have <S%H3001>dried<s%> up. Their <S%H4794>course<s%> also is <S%H7451>evil,<s%> And their <S%H1369>might<s%> is not <S%H9210>right.<s%>

"For <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H3548>priest<s%> are <S%H2610>polluted;<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> in My <S%H1004>house<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> their <S%H9567>wickedness,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> will be like <S%H2519>slippery<s%> <S%H2519>paths<s%> to them, They will be <S%H9083>driven<s%> <S%H1760>away<s%> into the <S%H653>gloom<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> in it; For I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H9567>calamity<s%> upon them, The <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>punishment,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Moreover, among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> an <S%H8604>offensive<s%> <S%H8604>thing:<s%> They <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and <S%H8582>led<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>astray.<s%>

"Also among the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H8186>horrible<s%> <S%H8186>thing:<s%> The <S%H5003>committing<s%> of <S%H5003>adultery<s%> and <S%H1980>walking<s%> in <S%H8267>falsehood;<s%> And they <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> So that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> has <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from his <S%H9567>wickedness.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of them have <S%H1961>become<s%> to Me like <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> And her <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> like <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H398>feed<s%> them <S%H3939>wormwood<s%> And make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H7219>poisonous<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> For from the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H2613>Pollution<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>'"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "Do not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who are <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> to you. They are <S%H1891>leading<s%> you into <S%H1891>futility;<s%> They <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of their own <S%H3820>imagination,<s%> Not from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"They keep <S%H559>saying<s%> to those who <S%H5006>despise<s%> Me, 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> "You will <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> "'; and as for <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of his own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> They <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H9567>'Calamity<s%> will not <S%H935>come<s%> upon you.'

"But <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> That he should <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> His <S%H1697>word<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7181>given<s%> <S%H7181>heed<s%> to His <S%H1697>word<s%> and <S%H8085>listened<s%>?

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H9370>storm<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> Even a <S%H9123>whirling<s%> <S%H5591>tempest;<s%> It will <S%H9123>swirl<s%> <S%H9123>down<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

"The <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> He has <S%H6213>performed<s%> and <S%H6965>carried<s%> out the <S%H4209>purposes<s%> of His <S%H3820>heart;<s%> In the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you will <S%H998>clearly<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> it.
"I did not <S%H7971>send<s%> [these] <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> But they <S%H7323>ran.<s%> I did not <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, But they <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%>

"But <S%H518>if<s%> they had <S%H5975>stood<s%> in My <S%H5475>council,<s%> Then they would have <S%H8085>announced<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> to My <S%H5971>people,<s%> And would have <S%H7725>turned<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> And from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of their <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>
"Am I a <S%H430>God<s%> who is <S%H7138>near,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And not a <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H7350><s%>?

"Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself in <S%H4565>hiding<s%> <S%H4565>places,<s%> So I do not <S%H7200>see<s%> him?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "Do I not <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%>?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H559>said<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> in My <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'I <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2492>dream,<s%> I <S%H2492>had<s%> a <S%H2492>dream!<s%>'

<S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%>? Is <S%H3426>there<s%> [anything] in the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> even [these] <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of the <S%H9652>deception<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%>

who <S%H2803>intend<s%> to make My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5608>relate<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as their fathers <S%H1>forgot<s%> My <S%H7911>name<s%> because of <S%H8034>Baal<s%>?

"The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H854>has<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> may <S%H5608>relate<s%> [his] <S%H2472>dream,<s%> but let him <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H854>has<s%> My <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> My <S%H1697>word<s%> in <S%H571>truth.<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> does <S%H8401>straw<s%> have [in common] with <S%H1250>grain<s%>?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
"Is not My <S%H1697>word<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "and like a <S%H6360>hammer<s%> which <S%H9455>shatters<s%> a <S%H5553>rock<s%>?

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "who <S%H1589>steal<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> from <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "who <S%H3947>use<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> and <S%H5001>declare,<s%> '[The Lord] declares.'

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5921>against<s%> those who have <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H2472>dreams,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "and <S%H5608>related<s%> them, and <S%H8582>led<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> by their <S%H8267>falsehoods<s%> and <S%H6350>reckless<s%> <S%H6350>boasting;<s%> yet I did not <S%H7971>send<s%> them or <S%H6680>command<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> do they <S%H3276>furnish<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H3276>slightest<s%> <S%H3276>benefit,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"Now <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> is the <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?' then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H4100>'What<s%> <S%H9294>oracle<s%>?' The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> 'I shall <S%H5203>abandon<s%> you.'

"Then as for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> or the <S%H3548>priest<s%> or the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>' I shall <S%H6485>bring<s%> <S%H6485>punishment<s%> upon that <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>household.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> shall <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H559>say<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> and to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>?' or, <S%H4100>'What<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?'

"For you will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> man's own <S%H1697>word<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H9294>oracle,<s%> and you have <S%H2015>perverted<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you will <S%H559>say<s%> to [that] <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> you?' and, <S%H4100>'What<s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%>?'

"For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>' <S%H3651>surely<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> you <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%>" The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%> "I have also <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You shall not <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H9294>oracle<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord!<s%>'"'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I shall <S%H5382>surely<s%> <S%H5382>forget<s%> you and <S%H5203>cast<s%> you <S%H5203>away<s%> from My <S%H6440>presence,<s%> along with the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you and your fathers.
"And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on you and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3640>humiliation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will not be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>"
